resources.string: Your application number is only stored on your device and is only used to query the Swedish Migration Agency\'s website to get the status of your application.
Please answer the questions about your application to get the average waiting time for similar applications
This Web browser can only be used for getting the average waiting time
The Swedish Migration Agency have updated the estimated waiting time.

About 
This is NOT an official application of the Swedish Migration Agency. 

Privacy 
This application only stores information locally on your device. 
The information you provide is only used to query the Swedish Migration Agency website and the results of those queries are formatted and shown to you. 
Ads 
This Application uses AdMob which may use the advertising ID of your device to better serve targeted ads. 
If you want to opt out of this please visit https://www.google.com/settings/u/0/ads/authenticated 

Usage 
This application is still a alpha version, and it is possible and probable it won'nt graduate to even a beta version. 
You can expect frequent crashes and broken functionality as this application is build on the functionality of the Swedish Migration Agency's website. 
You can expect some functions to be completely broken since the ability to test those functions would require the knowledge about exactly when a case would get a decision. 
Because of the information provided above, check your case on the Swedish Migration Agency's website if you want to be sure about your case's status. 

Legal 
THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE. 

Libraries This application uses JSoup (distributed under the MIT license (Copyright © 2009 - 2016 Jonathan Hedley (jonathan@hedley.net))) to parse migrationsverkets website. 

About This application was made as the final project of a mobile programming course I studied.

This application is NOT an official application of the Swedish Migration Agency.

This application was made by a person who is/was waiting for the Swedish Migration Agency to make a decision in his girlfriend's case. 

Contact 
If you have any questions about this application you can email me at celers.dev@gmail.com 
Any questions regarding your case should be directed towards http://www.migrationsverket.se/English/Contact-us/Call-us.html
Choose custom waiting time in months
This type of waiting time isn\'t implemented yet
New Version \nThis application have been updated and all data had to be reset. \nI apologize for the inconvenience.

Congratulations 
A decision seems to have been made in your case.


This feature is untested because it would require me to know when an application would get a decision. Please let me know if you got this message and you didn't get a decision.
A decision has been made in your case
Set and use custom waiting time
